GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v6.0.13
GSD.description:
net: hisilicon: Fix potential use-after-free in hix5hd2_rx()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.13 by commit b6307f7a2fc1c5407b6176f2af34a95214a8c262, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 57c5bc9ad7d799e9507ba6e993398d2c55f03fab. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: hisilicon: Fix potential use-after-free in hix5hd2_rx()
